Bravo for the Missions! Thanks for much love!! You are the New of the Fatherland! Thank you brothers and sisters. #MisionesConCHAVEZ
# President Mohamed Morsi: After the result I was applauding myself from the responsibility and I wish God success and go to the people of all of Egypt to have the help of God after
# President Mohamed Morsi: Anyone involved in the revolution could have been a martyr. No one knew where the bullets came from
# President Mohamed Morsi: No house in Egypt did not participate in the January 25 revolution
# President Mohamed Morsi: The blood of martyrs was the real fuel for the continuation of the revolution and continued to fuel all the steps that followed
# President Mohamed Morsi: We must make a lot of sweat so that we eat what we produce and will not pay us what we have to pay ourselves
The circulation of power is my own responsibility to take care of it and I rise on it - # President
No faction, party or stream should fear itself from the other party because the rule is for the fund and freedom of expression is guaranteed - # President
I do not interfere in the Constitution or the work of the Constitution Committee and what follows in the Constitution after the people's referendum I commit to - # President
Freedom of expression and opinion in the President or the Government is guaranteed to all and guaranteed by the executive branch and I am headed by - # President
Certainly we can achieve the renaissance and say to my faith in the people of Egypt - # President

We are working to close the sources of corruption and we are making important changes in the monitoring and detection of corruption so that we get rid of a legacy that weighs heavily on us all - President

What is spent on education is inadequate and we need to spend more and more on it although the general structure is good and the goal is the final product which is the student - # president
I claim that the education bill in Egypt is 100 billion pounds and the government contributes only 60% of this amount and we seek to spend the full amount of government - # President
I appeal to private education professionals not to burden people - # president
In the coming budget 2013-2014 we will raise the education budget by a reasonable rate - # President
We will build integrated residential areas to accommodate slum dwellers - # president
Administrative corruption began from the top of the pyramid and the recent changes aimed to manage more rational and less corrupt and in order to better distribute wealth - # President
I will not leave a corrupt in his place - # President
I move in the whole world to monitor the looted people's money and return it to him - # President
I am in contact with the unions to consult on what we should start with and what we can master - the president
God willing, many demands will be met in the next budget - # President
The decisions of 12 August were taken against the mandate given to me by the Egyptian people solely for the benefit of the people and not to the marginalization of the role of the institution
The President of Egypt, Supreme Commander of the Armed Forces, sponsors and sponsors the rest of the State institutions to advance their great role for the people
Wrap the people around the decisions of August 12 is a popular legitimacy of these decisions - # President
The legislation will be used only in the narrowest possible way, in urgent matters such as the health insurance and the right to choose in the public secondary school - the president

Our relations with Africa and the Nile Basin countries at the heart of our foreign policy - # President
The suffering of the Syrian people hurts us and disturbs all the peoples of the region - # President
Our relationship with Africa and the Nile Basin countries at the heart of our foreign policy - # President
The Syrian people must be stopped and the Syrian regime must realize that it violates all laws and customs - the president
Peace can not be achieved in the region without the Palestinian people getting their rights and establishing their state with their free will and supporting them in their decisions.
Egypt will remain an incubator for the rights of the Palestinian people - # President
I blocked a photo comment in the President's Palace to end the era of the individual and replace it with the state of institutions, which is not a big step - # President
I do my duty as much as possible until Egypt becomes a superpower and a leader and I am very optimistic - # President
Egyptian foreign relations now are based on balance in the relationship and balance in achieving mutual interest and respect - # President
We want to have four: will, food, medicine and weapons - # President
The coming tweets are the most important ideas highlighted by the HE president #Morsi
The blood of the martyrs was the real fuel of the revolution and was the fuel behind all of the changes that came subsequently - #Morsi
We need some time, but we have many reasons for hope: resources and willpower. We will move together God willing to a better tomorrow- # Morsi
We will have to work very hard until we can produce what we need. No one will do for us what we must do for ourselves - #Morsi
After the result, I felt overwhelmed by the responsibility and I prayed to Allah and put my faith in the Egyptian people - #Morsi
No political party, group, or current should fear another - #Morsi
The ballot box is the arbiter and freedom of expression is guaranteed for all sides - #Morsi
I do not interfere in the writing of the constitution - #Morsi
I will uphold whatever the constitution dictates once the People endorse it - #Morsi
I took the August 12 decisions not to marginalize any institutions but rather as the expression of the will of the people - #Morsi
I will only use my legislative authority in the narrowest of circumstances - #Morsi
Our relations with Africa and the countries of the Nile basin are at the heart of our foreign policy - #Morsi
We must stem the blodshed in #Syria and the #Syrian regime must understand that it is operating outside of all laws and norms - #Morsi
Peace can not be achieved in the region without the Palestinian people receiving their full rights and establishing their state - #Morsi
We support the Palestinians in their quest for their rights - #Morsi
Our foreign policy now is based on mutual respect and shared interests - #Morsi
